key_features: Earn 4.7% Bonus Citi M1 Rebate on eligible Entertainment spend.
Earn Up to 10% Citi M1 Rebate on your M1 recurring bills
Enjoy 2.7% Bonus Citi M1 Rebate on M1 Telco Bill Charges.
Earn 0.3% Citi M1 Rebate on retail transactions
Earn up to 1% Citi M1 Rebate on purchases at M1 Shops

Enjoy 10% off device accessories at M1 Shops
Waiver of Activation Fees for Data Passport Registration Fees and M1 Value-Added Services
Citi M1 Rebate do not expire
Complimentary replacement for lost and damaged SIM cards

eligibility: MoneySmart Exclusive Promotion is valid from 20-March 2025 to 31-March-2025
Applicable for New-to Citibank Cardmembers only
Activate the approved Eligible Card via the Citi Mobile App and spend a minimum of S$500 which falls under “Qualifying Spend” within a 30-day period inclusive of account approval date.
Log into your MoneySmart account and submit your claim by 30th April 2025

fees.cash_advance_fee: S$15 or 8% of the amount drawn, whichever is higher
